attributes.action: Ban sale of fireworks to the general public
attributes.additional_details: My proposal is that fireworks are only available to organisers of registered displays and even then only upon receipt of a permit from the local council
attributes.background: Too many incidents involve the public using fireworks incorrectly or maliciously, including harm to people (especially children) and animals. A lot of animals are either injured or killed with fireworks, either physically by the firework or due to the stress caused by the noise.
